attributes.action: refuse to consider the further expansion of Heathrow Airport beyond its current perimeter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To prevent the destruction of the ancient Parish of Harmondsworth which would involve the demolition (in whole or part)of Sipson, Harmondsworth and Harlington and the enforced expulsion of thousands of citizens from their homes and places of work
